# argumentInfo

**Type Property**

An option instance that provides argument information for textures and threadgroup memory.

## Declaration

```swift
static var argumentInfo: MTLPipelineOption { get }
```

## Discussion

This option provides all properties of an [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument] instance, except for [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument/bufferStructType] and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLArgument/bufferPointerType], which are `nil`. To obtain these detailed buffer type properties, retrieve the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLPipelineOption/bufferTypeInfo] instance.

## Retrieving argument information

- **bufferTypeInfo**: An option instance that provides detailed buffer type information for buffer arguments.
- **failOnBinaryArchiveMiss**: An option that instructs the compiler to return an error when a GPU function isn’t in a binary archive.
